name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color picker and lorem ipsum text generator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pick the color of anything and generate lorem ipsum text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you pick a color from anywhere on the screen (even outside of Chrome) and copies the hex code to your clipboard.

You can also generate random lorem ipsum text.

No weird permissions required.
